definition: any of two families of small parasitic arachnids with barbed proboscis, put a check mark on or near or next to
details:
noun
- any of two families of small parasitic arachnids with barbed proboscis
- a light mattress
- a mark indicating that something has been noted or completed etc.
= synonyms: check
- a metallic tapping sound
= example: a metallic tapping sound
= synonyms: ticking
verb
- put a check mark on or near or next to
= synonyms: mark
- sew
= example: sew
= synonyms: retick
- make a sound like a clock or a timer
= example: make a sound like a clock or a timer
= synonyms: ticktack, ticktock
- make a clicking or ticking sound
= example: make a clicking or ticking sound
= synonyms: click
